actions.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A074) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 183 (Roll no. 263).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A074) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 183 (Roll no. 263).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A074) offered by Mr. Grayson.

description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to compel a journalist or a reporter to testify about information or sources that the journalist or reporter states in a motion to quash the subpoena that he has obtained as a journalist or reporter and that he regards as confidential.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to compel a journalist or a reporter to testify about information or sources that the journalist or reporter states in a motion to quash the subpoena that he has obtained as a journalist or reporter and that he regards as confidential.
